__TOC__

Daniel Jitnah lives in Clayton, Victoria, Australia and has been a long time Linux user.  He has been using Ubuntu /Kubuntu on a regular basis during the last 2 years.

He is an independent developer and runs an open source and Linux consultancy business with a strong focus on Ubuntu/Kubuntu.

With an on going interest in the education sector (also being a qualified school teacher), he is eager to investigate and promote Edubuntu to educators and education institutions.

He is also interested in promoting environmentally friendly - Green IT practices, and considers the use of Ubuntu, Linux and open source systems as highly compatible with this pursuit.

Contact/Website: www.greenwareit.com.au
